actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to make specific provisions for ball or roller bearing pillow block, flange, take-up, cartridge, and hanger units in the Tariff Schedules of  the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to designate specific customs rates for ball or roller bearing pillow block flange, take-up, cartridge and hanger units.

titles.title: A bill to make specific provisions for ball or roller bearing pillow block, flange, take-up, cartridge, and hanger units in the Tariff Schedules of  the United States.
